articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Chinese People's Daily Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Chinese People's Daily Delegation
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of People's Daily of China headed by its President Zhang Yannong at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese People's Daily Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese People's Daily Delegation
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting delegation of People's Daily of China.
					 It was conveyed by Zhang Yannong, president of the daily who is heading the delegation, to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Guinea-Bissau
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Guinea-Bissau
Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Malam Bacai Sanha, President of Guinea-Bissau, on the occasion of the 36th anniversary of the proclamation of the republic.
					The message sincerely wished the President great success in his work for the social stability of the country and the well-fare of the people.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Meets Foreign Delegations and Delegates
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Meets Foreign Delegations and Delegates
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Kim Yong Il met and had a talk with delegations and delegates of various countries participating in the celebrations of the golden jubilee of the Foreign Trade Bank of the DPRK at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.

articles.title: "Giant Footprints of Woman Commander of Mt. Paektu" Off Press
articles.content:
"Giant Footprints of Woman Commander of Mt. Paektu" Off Press
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- The Kum Song Youth Publishing House brought out the book "Giant Footprints of Woman Commander of Mt. Paektu" on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of demise of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 The book deals with some of the revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites associated with the exploits of Kim Jong Suk together with photos in a chronological order of her revolutionary activities.
					
					 The book is divided into the part dealing with the revolutionary battle sites during the anti-Japanese armed struggle and the part dealing with the revolutionary sites in the period of building a new country after the liberation.
					
					 The first part gives a detailed account of the log cabin which housed the headquarters of the revolution where President Kim Il Sung led the overall Korean revolution from the latter half of the 1930s to the first half of the 1940s after choosing its site and leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan secret camp and the revolutionary battle sites in the areas of Mt. Paektu, Phungsan, Sinpha, Yonsa, Musan, Sinhung, Rangrim and so on associated with the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 The second part of the book deals with historic facts about the energetic activities conducted by Kim Jong Suk in Pyongyang, South Phyongan Province, North Hamgyong Province, South Hwanghae Province, Kangwon Province and other places to arouse the broad masses to building a rich and powerful country true to the intention of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The book stresses that the revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites which bear witness to the exploits of Kim Jong Suk are wealth of eternal value of the Korean revolution and treasures of Songun Korea for all ages.

articles.title: Amnokgang Sports Team Greets 62nd Birthday
articles.content:
Amnokgang Sports Team Greets 62nd Birthday
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- The Amnokgang Sports Team greets the 62nd anniversary this year.
					 It was founded and has developed as a famous sports team in the country under the care of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 Hong Sok Yong, chief of the team, told KCNA as follows:
					
					 Busy as he was with building a new country after the liberation of the country, President Kim Il Sung saw to it that the team was formed on September 19, Juche 36 (1947) as the first of its kind in Korea.
					
					 And he had visited our sports team to inspire athletes to display their might in national and international games to the full.
					
					 During the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War, he recalled athletes from the front and provided all conditions for sports training. In the postwar period, too, he led the athletes energetically to catch up with the advanced countries in some sports events.
					
					 When they returned home after winning signal successes in international matches, he was pleased with their successes more than anybody else and bestowed warm love and benevolence on them who demonstrated the dignity and honor of the motherland.
					
					 The sports team is in the heyday of its development under the wise guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In September 1962 when he called at the sports team, he gave important instructions that would be served as guidelines in the work of the team from the issue of holding championship in international and national contests to the issue of training reserves. He indicated game tactics, seeing games of its athletes on scores of occasions.
					
					 Now its athletes are stepping up training with a goal to hold world championship in football, marathon, wrestling, boxing and weightlifting and other events.

articles.title: Physical Culture and Sports Activities Get Popularized
articles.content:
Physical Culture and Sports Activities Get Popularized
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- The physical culture and sports activities are getting brisk in the months of the people's physical strength examination in the DPRK.
					 The state set up every August and September as months of the people's physical strength examination and created a physical culture and sports atmosphere among the people through the check-up so that they can train their physical strength and firmly prepare themselves for labor and national defense. 
					
					 Ministries and national institutions including the State Planning Commission, the Ministry of Metal Industry, the Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications have grasped those fit for the examination and informed them of the examination events and standards.
					
					 Industrial establishments give sports-related general knowledge to working people through sports billboards and are securing various sports facilities.
					
					 And they popularize physical culture and sports activities and make it a rule to do them every day and regularly organize group running, health-promoting Taekwon-Do and mass rhythmic gymnastics as well as various sports games with defense sports as the main while conducting activities for the months of people's physical strength examination under a scrupulous plan.
					
					 The industrial establishments including Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, Chollima Steel Complex, Anju Area Coal Complex and Kaechon Railway Bureau have fixed sports time in accordance with their specific conditions and are conducting in a regular way cross-country running, hurdle-overcoming, horizontal bar, parallel bars and other exercises so as to make the employees train their body and mind.
					
					 Universities, colleges and secondary schools including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Hamhung College of Statistics and Subok Secondary School in Sunchon City are strengthening group forced march, swimming training, etc. while explaining the importance of the physical culture and sports to the students.
					
					 Also the physical culture and sports activities are being conducted briskly in the field of the agriculture.
					
					 Rihyon Co-op Farm, Sadong District of Pyongyang, Migok Co-op Farm, Sariwon City and other farms often organize sports games to help all the farmers possess strong physical strength.

articles.title: Japan's Moves to Develop Space Weapons under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Moves to Develop Space Weapons under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- It was reported that Japan recently launched large carrier rocket H2B-1 and Japan would launch a cargo vehicle HTV every year and a total of seven till 2015 by the above-said rocket.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Japan claimed that its recent launch of the carrier rocket and its planned launch of more of the same type are aimed at the "use of space for peaceful purposes" but these moves can hardly be interpreted apart from its ever more undisguised moves for militarizing space. 
					
					 As regards Japan's launch of the above-said rocket, the DPRK can not but remind the world community of the foolish things done by it over the DPRK's launch of a satellite for peaceful purposes.  
					
					When the DPRK launched the satellite Kwangmyongsong 2 by rocket Unha 2, the Japanese reactionaries made much fuss about it as if something serious had happened, asserting that it posed "a great threat" to Japan and the like. It was none other than Japan which took the lead in persistently insisting that the DPRK's above-mentioned launch should be brought up for discussion at the UN Security Council.
					
					 Japan has taken issue with the DPRK's space development for peaceful purposes while doing whatever it likes.
					
					  Availing itself of this opportunity, the DPRK has something to say to the UNSC.
					
					 The UNSC has kept mum about the launch of satellites by Japan and south Korea while taking issue with the DPRK's legitimate satellite launch, departing from the principle of impartiality. 
					
					The UNSC should not be allowed to repeat such wrong application of double standards in serious violation of the principle of impartiality and the extreme decision to put "sanctions upon the DPRK" should be withdrawn. This is what human conscience demands. 
					
					 Japan would be well advised to lend an ear to the voices reflecting human conscience and stop the reckless moves for space militarization and for the conversion of it into a military giant, the moves that disturb the global peace and security and spark new arms race and danger of war, urges the commentary.

articles.title: Successful Conclusion of This Year's Campaign for Great Surge Called for
articles.content:
Successful Conclusion of This Year's Campaign for Great Surge Called for
Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- All the party members and other working people are called upon to continue giving spurs to the on-going general advance with the same vim and vigor with which they emerged victors in the 150-day campaign, single-mindedly united around General Secretary Kim Jong Il, and thus strikingly demonstrate once again the revolutionary spirit of heroic Korea dynamically advancing toward the eminence of a great prosperous and powerful nation with the speed of Songun Chollima. This appeal is made by leading newspapers Wednesday in editorials. 
					 Rodong Sinmun notes that the shining victory won in the 150-day campaign helped the DPRK take a fresh giant stride forward in building a thriving nation and opened up a brighter prospect before the nation.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 During the 150-day campaign the Korean people fully displayed boundless loyalty in thoroughly carrying out the leader's idea and intention and the party's line and policies with one and the same thought and purpose and such inexhaustible mental power as implementing them in a do-or-die spirit. This period witnessed heroic struggles through which they fully displayed the invincible stamina of Songun Korea by turning impossibility into possibility and bringing about epoch-making changes. 
					
					 The 150-day campaign clearly testified to the fact that the party's intention and determination were entirely just and only victory and glory are in store for the Korean people making a steady advance while struggling with the above-said mental power.
					
					 The shining victory won in the 150-day campaign is a precious fruition of the energetic and tested guidance of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It is the traditional revolutionary mode and fighting spirit of the Korean people to effect uninterrupted innovations and make steady progress for greater victory, not remaining complacent with the achievements already made. 
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea is calling on all the people to wage a 100-day campaign.
					
					 All the party members and other working people should make greater leaping advances on all fronts with confidence and optimism about sure victory and thus provide without fail this year a sure guarantee for the final victory in the drive for building a thriving nation.
					
					 They are sure to win in the 100-day campaign as long as there are the tested and experienced leadership of the great party, matchless military capability, the unbreakable single-minded unity, the foundation of the powerful self-supporting national economy and a large contingent of those strong in thinking and mental power.
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all the officials and working people to dynamically conduct the 100-day campaign confident of victory and thus glorify this year as a year of great changes and a year of historic leaping advances without fail, the year which will witness a landmark turn in building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Independent Reunification of Korea Called for
articles.content:
Independent Reunification of Korea Called for
Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- It is the most urgent and important national task for the Koreans to reunify the divided country at present. Rodong Sinmun today says this in a signed article.
					The struggle of the Koreans for national reunification is a sacred struggle to reunify the divided nation and achieve unity and thus recover its former appearance as a homogeneous nation, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					For the Korean nation divided by outside forces to get reunified as one nation is a natural trend and a law-governed requirement for the development of the nation's history. The outside forces for aggression are making desperate efforts to keep Korea divided into two parts indefinitely but they will get them nowhere. 
					
					The progressive organizations and people from all walks of life in south Korea are now waging a dynamic movement for national reunification under the banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration. This is a manifestation of the firm will and faith of the south Korean people to shatter the anti-reunification moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad and achieve the independent reunification through an alliance with the north without fail. It is, at the same time, an expression of the Koreans' indomitable spirit of independence and their fixed will.
					
					No force on earth can keep the homogeneous Korean nation divided indefinitely as it was formed and has developed through a long history or stamp out the national character peculiar to the Koreans. Steadfast are the will and faith of the Koreans to put an end to outside forces' domination and interference and build a reunified thriving nation on this land.
					
					Korea will always remain one. If all the Koreans struggle, united close under the banner of "By our nation itself", they will certainly achieve independent reunification, pulling through all difficulties and obstacles lying in the way of national reunification.

articles.title: Senior Egyptian and Russian Officials Visits DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Senior Egyptian and Russian Officials Visits DPRK Embassies
Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- Senior Egyptian and Russian officials paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK embassies in Cairo and Moscow on Sept. 7 and 9 on the occasion of the 61st birthday of the DPRK.
					The chamberlain of the Egyptian Presidency asked the DPRK ambassador to Egypt to convey the congratulations from President Hosni Mubarak to General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					The mayor of Khabarovsk of Russia laid a bunch of flowers before the full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together.

articles.title: New Protective Spectacles
articles.content:
New Protective Spectacles
 Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the then Hwanghae Iron Works on one day of May, Juche 55 (1966).
					 Watching perspiration-soaked smelters looking into a furnace, he took protective spectacles from a smelter and asked him whether it could completely protect eyes.
					
					 As the worker replied that eyes were protected, he personally guessed what irritation the light of burning molten iron had on eyes. And then he said that the eyes were important for everybody, particularly more important for the smelters, stressing that money should not be stinted to protect the eyes of smelters.
					
					 He, who worried about the eyesight of the smelters, stressed that better protective spectacles should be provided to them, and left the working site.
					
					 So, new protective spectacles have been supplied to the smelters every year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de delegacion china
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de delegacion china
Pyongyang, 23 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dirigiera la delegacion del Diario del Pueblo de China encabezada por el presidente Zhang Yannong de visita en Corea.
					El jefe de la delegacion lo entrego el dia 23 a Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena maniobra de militarizacion espacial de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena maniobra de militarizacion espacial de Japon
Pyongyang, 23 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, Japon lanzo el gran cohete transportador "H2B-1" y planea lanzar cada ano una astronave de cargas "HTV" y siete en total hasta 2015.
					  Aunque Japon describe como el "uso pacifico del espacio" el lanzamiento del gran cohete transportador y el plan de lanzarlo en lo adelante, esto nunca puede pensar al margen de la maniobra de militarizacion espacial del pais isleno que se torna cada dia abierta.
					
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 23 y continua:
					
					  En relacion con el lanzamiento de dicho cohete transportador de Japon, no podemos menos que recordar la conducta descarada de Japon que cuestiono nuestro lanzamiento del satelite artificial con fines pacifistas.
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses armaron alborotos hablando tanto de que el lanzamiento del satelite  "Kwangmyongsong-No.2" por el cohete transportador "Unha-2" de la RPDC viene la gran amenaza para ellos. Se pusieron en la delantera insistiendo tercamente en que deben someter el problema de lanzamiento de satelite artificial de la RPDC en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					  Aprovechando esta oportunidad, la RPDC no puede menos que presentar susodicho problema tambien en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					  Esta entidad internacional, que pierde la imparcialidad, cuestiona a toda costa el legitimo lanzamiento de satelite artificial de la RPDC. Pero, guarda el silencio sobre el lanzamiento de satelites de Japon y el Sur de Corea. No debe ser repetida tal conducta injusta del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que aplica la norma de doble rasero que contraviene al principio de imparcialidad. Debe ser revocada la extrema determinacion de la "sancion anti-RPDC", lo cual es la demanda de la conciencia de la humanidad.
					
					  Japon debe prestar oidos a tal voz de la conciencia humana y abandonar las temerarias maniobras de la militarizacion espacial y la conversion de su pais en la potencia militar que destruyen la paz y la seguridad del mundo y acarrean una nueva carrera armamentista y el peligro de guerra.

articles.title: Periodicos llaman a todo el pueblo a la campana de 100 dias
articles.content:
Periodicos llaman a todo el pueblo a la campana de 100 dias
 Pyongyang, 23 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Con el impetu con que triunfaron en la campana de 150 dias todos los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores unidos monoliticamente en torno al Dirigente       Kim Jong Il, deben seguir dando acicate a la marcha general de hoy para exaltar de nuevo el temple revolucionario de la Corea heroica que corre a todo galope hacia la cumbre de la gran potencia prospera con el espiritu de Chollima (caballo alado) del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					  Asi senalan los periodicos capitalinos en sus editoriales insertados el dia 23.
					
					  Gracias al brillante triunfo logrado en la campana de 150 dias, en Corea la causa de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera dio nuevo y gigantesco paso y se abrio la perspectiva mas iluminante en el futuro de la patria, subraya el editorial del periodico Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					  Los 150 dias fueron el periodo en que el pueblo coreano puso de pleno manifiesto su infinita fidelidad  de sostener con la misma alma el proyecto y la voluntad de su dirigente, la linea y la politica del partido, y su potencia espiritual de materializacion cabal.
					
					  Tambien, fueron la trayectoria de la lucha heroica que mostro energicamente el impetu invencible de Corea del Songun, que registra saltos seculares convirtiendo la imposibilidad en la posibilidad.
					
					  La citada campana demostro patentemente que son muy justos el proyecto y la decision del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y que la victoria y la gloria estaran siempre ante el pueblo coreano que avanza y lucha con el espiritu indoblegable.
					
					  El brillante triunfo en esta campana es el precioso resultado de la dinamica y probada direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					  El pueblo coreano tiene el tradicional modo de hacer la revolucion y el estilo de lucha de seguir logrando innovaciones y avanzando hacia el mayor triunfo sin vanagloriarse del triunfo ya alcanzado.
					
					  Hoy, el Partido del Trabajo de Corea llama a todo el pueblo a la campana de 100 dias.
					
					  Todos los militantes y otros trabajadores, llenos de la fe en la victoria y el optimismo, deben levantar mas furiosamente la tempestad de gran salto en todos los dominios y tienen que preparar a toda costa en este ano la garantia firme para el triunfo final de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					  Es definitivo el triunfo de la nueva campana porque hay la veterana y probada direccion del gran partido, el poderio militar invencible, la inquebrantable unidad monolitica, la potente base de la economia independiente y el gran destacamento de los hombres fuertes en la idea y el espiritu.
					
					  El editorial del periodico Minju Joson enfatiza que todos los funcionarios y trabajadores, con la conviccion del triunfo, deben desarrollar energicamente la campana de 100 dias de hoy y hacer sin falta de 2009 el ano de gran cambio y salto historico en que se prepara la coyuntura de viraje en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera.

articles.title: Personalidades de Egipto y Rusia visitan representaciones de Corea
articles.content:
Personalidades de Egipto y Rusia visitan representaciones de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 23 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Varias personalidades de Egipto y Rusia visitaron los dias 7 y 9 las representaciones de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acreditadas en respectivos paises para felicitarle el 61o aniversario de la fundacion.
					El secretario del gabinete presidencial de Egipto rogo al embajador coreano que transmita al Dirigente Kim Jong Il el saludo de felicitacion del presidente Mohamed Hosni Mubarak.
					
					El alcalde de Jabarovsk de Rusia deposito el ramo de flores ante el retrato de cuerpos completos del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il encontrandose juntos.
